entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 10:30 AM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023
Temperature: 2.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 69 %
Dewpoint: -2.9°C
Wind: E 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow becoming mixed with drizzle this afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas this morning and early this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast this morning and early this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with drizzle ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023
